page.title: 08A Newcomer
page.content: The Rev.Maurice Johnson came to Springfield Methodist Church, Lydney, in 1979; his first ministry.An initial day visit, he said, was bewildering as he was taken in quick succession to all six churches he would be covering. His first impression on moving in was the great welcome he received, with help for the move, digging his garden and provision of a welcoming meal. He found the local people easy to get to know and independent though the dialect gave him a few problems. He has particularly enjoyed the local countryside especially visits to the Wye Valley and picnicking at a local beauty spot, Mallard's Pike. In 1986 he will be moving on to a new ministry with mixed feelings. He has been very happy here and will miss the many friendships he has made as well as the area's great beauty.
